text:
Buy Night suit for Men Online at Best Prices
Good sleep needs the best night suit for men
At the end of the day, our favourite clothing is what we lounge at home and sleep in. Night suit for men and night suit for men has to be extremely comfortable, relaxing, have a soft feel, and also, look really smart. Everybody is investing in cool night suit these days. It doesn’t just matter if you wear them at home, night suit is great for vacations, hanging out with friends during night outs, chill time by the pool or the beach, and to basically live in if you are still in work from home mode. When shopping night suit for mens, focus on comfort, but also pick pieces that look smart and cool, just in case you have company. At Westside, we have endless options when it comes to night suit for mens, and you will find something for everybody, in cool styles, and in the latest fashion.
Shopping night suit for men
Night suit for men doesn’t have to be boring anymore. At Westside, from cool t-shirts to pyjamas and boxers, we’ve got them all. Definitely invest in a neat collection of t-shirts for men. They can be solids, or funny printed options too. Night dress for men is about letting your hair down, so, don’t be afraid to be tongue-in-cheek. If you think about it, much of your personality actually shines through your night suit choices. Printed t-shirts are great choices. Smart pyjamas and boxers are a perfect pairing too. While many of you might think that it is unnecessary to invest time and energy on night dress for men, think about all those family sleepovers and night outs with friends, and how terrible night suit can just make you the butt of jokes. It is extremely important, therefore, to invest adequate time and energy in choosing the right night dress for mens. When it comes to pyjamas and boxers, avoid solids because they are boring. If you want to play safe, checks and stripes in interesting colours are great options. Additionally, for the adventurous ones, choose prints. Micro prints if you are starting out of course, but if you are interested in starting conversations, choose wild, bold prints, which will make sure that everybody is talking about you. Always remember that wherever you are, what you are wearing is an extension of you.
Why shop for night suit for men?
Like night suit for men, most men think that night suit is not important enough to be separately shopping for. What they don’t think about is that night suit for men has a variety of uses. You live in night suit during vacations, when you spend time at the pool, at beaches, and generally almost always at home. Then, how is it that night suit is not a priority? Stylish night suit is required whenever you have company over at home, if you want to make an impression. Think of all the times, while travelling, you have judged badly dressed people at hotel lobbies. When you don’t invest in stylish and proper night suit, you tend to work with whatever you have in your wardrobe, and hence make a bunch of fashion faux pas. So, invest in night suit and night suit for men, and make sure you look stylish always – AM to PM.

5 things to keep in mind when shopping ethnic wear for men
In India, every man’s wardrobe has an ethnic wear section, for festivities and special occasions. And you can argue with us on this, but Indians do look their dapper best in ethnic wear for men. Indian ethnic wear is can be simple and elegant or embellished and celebratory, creating a wide spectrum of choices depending on your personal taste and preferences, and then, depending on the occasion you are shopping for. Whether you are shopping mens ethnic wear online or at stores, make sure that you have complete clarity on a couple of factors before you pick up pieces for yourself. At Westside, we have a wide range of stylish ethnic wear for men to choose from, and you will definitely find the perfect outfit for each and every occasion.
An ethnic wear for men shopping guide
It all starts with occasion and utility. When you are shopping ethnic wear for men, make sure you are occasion-appropriate. If you need casual everyday options, pick up simple solid or micro-print kurtas, and stay away from embroidery or embellishing of any kind. It is also important to pick up pieces that a versatile. Can the kurta you chose be worn for multiple occasions? While heavy-duty occasion wear is only fit for festivities and grand functions, casual ethnic wear can be worn in various ways. For example, rather than investing in an embellished kurta, you can choose to build a collection of solid and pattern kurtas, which can then be worn with embellished standout Nehru jackets when the occasion asks for it. Secondly, when you are shopping ethnic wear for mens online, always make sure that you get the size right. A bad fit is a dealbreaker when it comes to ethnic wear for men. So, whether you are shopping mens ethnic wear online or at stores, get the size, fit, and lengths right. Thirdly, experiment with colours, prints, and patterns. Indian ethnic wear for men is a treasure trove of the country’s various prints and patterns. Don’t shy away from wearing colours you generally don’t wear to work. Ethnic wear is all about having fun. Prints are huge right now, and nothing says fun like prints and patterns in ethnic wear. Check out ethnic wear for mens online on social media for ideas on how to wear prints. Start simple. Try out micro-prints and stripes first, if you are a novice. For the adventurous, for your next occasion, maybe go print-on-print? Next, it is important to understand ethnic wear layering. Style your kurtas with smart Nehru jackets. Check out mens ethnic wear online on Instagram and Pinterest to see how celebrities and influencers are pairing kurtas with Nehru jackets, the contrasts they are building, and how to put together a standout ethnic wear outfit. You can also wear kurtas with jackets and blazers, but make sure the kurta length complements the length of the jacket, and that they are fitted to your frame perfectly. And lastly, accessorise, accessorise, accessorise! Wear jewellery, use pocket squares, some great slip-ons or shoes, and a pair of cool shades.
Shopping ethnic wear for men at Westside
Whether you are shopping ethnic wear for mens online or at our stores, at Westside we have the coolest collection of ethnic wear for men in a variety of styles, fit for every occasion. So, come over today, and shop till you drop. Trust us, you won’t be able to stop till you have shopped the whole store!

Buy Sneakers For Men Online at Lowest Prices in India
Buy sneakers for men online
Everybody needs to shop for mens sneakers and sneakers shoes for men for the gym, cool running shoes for men or trainers for your morning jog, or are looking for stylish thick sole sneakers for all those streetwear inspired OOTDs, and that’s why the Westside range of sneakers shoes for men will definitely blow your mind. You can check out mens sneakers online or at our store, and when you check out our wide range of mens sneakers online, you will surely find your favourite pairs in a jiffy! Mens sneakers are everybody’s favourites for a while now, and rightfully so. Not only do they add a dose of edge and energy to every outfit, sneakers are very versatile shoes, which can be paired with almost about everything. While earlier people used to think that sneakers were only training shoes that you use at the gym or on the treadmill, over the course of time, and with athleisure taking over the fashion world, everyone wants to buy mens sneakersbecause they are a trend that is very much here to stay!
How to shop sneakers shoes for men
When shopping for mens sneakers or if you want to buy mens sneakers shoes for men, always remember that comfort is a priority. While style is of course a factor, but you should always check for comfort when shopping for mens sneakers onlineor if you are shopping for mens sneakers at our stores. At Westside, we know how to balance style with comfort, so, when you are shopping for mens sneakers online or checking out our vast range of sneakers shoes for men at the store, you will find pairs that look stunning but are also perfectly comfortable.
The next thing to keep in mind when shopping for mens sneakers,or any kind of training shoes for men,is the utility of the pair. Do you need to buy mens sneakers or sneakers shoes for men for the gym or for workouts, or are you looking to buy mens sneakers to pair with casual outfits? When shopping for mens sneakers online or at our stores, you need to first decide what occasion or activity you are shopping for. Sneakers for men are extremely versatile shoes these days, and you can wear mens sneakers to the gym and for workouts, but also can pair them with athleisure outfits, or you can even wear them to hangouts and parties. Have cool sneakers shoes for men that might look good with a brunch or boys’ night outfit? Why not? When it comes to sneakers, the world is truly your oyster and you can style them however you like!
Shopping for mens sneakers at Westside
While comfort is definitely top priority, when shopping for mens sneakers online, or at our stores, there are a couple of things you should keep in mind. It is crucial to be on top of trends. At Westside, you can browse through our collection of mens sneakers to understand what’s hot and what isn’t. Next, think of outfits while shopping for sneakers shoes for men, so that you have a full look in place. For example, if you are buying a pair of high tops, do you have the right kind of denims to go with it? At Westside, you can shop the whole look when you come to buy mens sneakers. And lastly, while shopping for sneakers, always invest in the classic styles because they never go out of fashion!

Have cool sneakers shoes for men that might look good with a brunch or boys’ night outfit? Why not? When it comes to sneakers, the world is truly your oyster and you can style them however you like!

text:
Buy Best Perfumes and Fragrances Online for Men
Buy Perfumes for Men Online in India
Nothing sets the vibe for the perfect gentleman like a good perfume for men. Every man is always searching for the best perfume for men. Perfumes can definitely make or break someone’s personality, and many say that the fragrance often is the first thing someone notices and the last thing everyone remembers in a man. So, it is very important that you pick the right perfume and shop for the best cologne for men and bestbody spray for men. But shopping for the best perfume for men or best cologne for men and the best body spray for men can be a tricky proposition. It is not possible for everyone to know what their ideal fragrance is. Most people make the mistake of choosing something based on recommendations or a fad, and then realise that they do not vibe with that fragrance at all. This is a very common error. We must always remember that perfumes are very personal and vary from body to body, reacting differently with different people. Hence, it is very important to try out fragrances before shopping for them. Whenever you are shopping for a perfume for men or body spray for men, while choosing your favourite scents, make sure to try them out to see how they react to your skin. Because, otherwise, you will land up making a very strong or pungent impression, or might have zero perfume coverage altogether.
How to shop perfume for men
Shopping for perfumes, like mentioned above, can be a tricky situation, but we are here to help you navigate. Firstly, when you are looking for the best perfume for men or the best body spray for men, always check the notes and ingredients. Having information about the notes is crucial. You need to know what is in your perfume so that you can decide whether these are ingredients you enjoy or not. It is a very important decision to make when shopping for the best perfume for men or best cologne for men – why do I like or dislike this specific fragrance? This holds true even when you are shopping for the best body spray for men. Having information on notes and ingredients will help you shop for perfumes better. Secondly, you should shop for different perfumes for different occasions and activities. You need a mellow but standout perfume for work, while you can buy headier and stronger options for party nights and festivities. Also, remember that, it is advisable to stick to a fixed number of perfumes so that people are not confused by an ever-changing range of scents.
Shopping perfume for men at Westside
At Westside, we have a wide range of fragrances that will definitely blow your mind. From refreshing aquatic notes, to lush tropical dashes of fruits and flora, from spicy ingredients to exotic flavours, we definitely have the best perfume for men and best cologne for men in a very attractive budget range. If you are not looking for the best cologne for men but want everyday body spray for men, look no further, because our range of best body spray for men will definitely blow your mind!

text:
Buy Heels for Women at Best Prices Online
Buy Heels for Women Online in India
It is always fun to shop heels for women. Every woman loves to shop for high heels or heel sandals for women. Also, heels come in a variety of styles and, very honestly, everybody should have at least one to two pairs of heels in every style. Different kinds of heels work with different outfits and different occasions. For example, high heels work for dressier occasions, like a party or a really fancy evening, where you are dressing up in glam, while heel for women are a lot more versatile. You can wear heel sandals to work, brunch, casual evenings, date nights, and parties. It is not just the style of heels for women but also the colour and type. It is important to have a few pairs in nudes and beige, along with options in tan and black. These are basic options that pair well with almost every outfit. Then you should invest in colours that will stand out and really make a statement. Reds, pinks, greens, and neons definitely set trends. After that, you should look for sequin and glitter options. These are up-glam high heels & block heels that everyone should have a few pairs of in their wardrobe, especially for high-octane parties. Also, while shopping heels for women, it is also important to build an outfit around it. At Westside, we have a wide range of options when it comes to heels and formals and partywear, so that you can create a fantastic look all at the same time!
Different types of heels for women
There are various kinds of heels for women and it is very important to understand that different styles of heels work for different occasions. Coloured high heels will not work for an office occasion, just like it is boring to wear beige heel sandals for women to a glamorous party. So, it is important to have various options, to wear to different functions. Beige, tan heels, block heels sandals are a great option to pair with workwear. You can choose from various styles of heel for women, and you can not only pair them with office wear but also with brunch outfits, casual wear for chilled out hangs, and they also pair beautifully with Indianwear. When shopping for high heels or heel sandals, it also important to take the outfit and the length of the outfit into consideration, and wear pieces accordingly. Coloured high heels, platforms, wedges, or heel sandals are a great option for partywear, and you can definitely rock any outfit with them. For glam looks, choose heel sandals for women that are statement and are not afraid to stand out. Heels can be a strong statement feature for any outfit, and can be the highlight accessory of a party OOTD, or even an Indianwear look. It is therefore very important to choose your high heels wisely and pair them according to your outfit.
Shopping heels for women at Westside
With the wide range of high heels, heel sandals, block heels for women at Westside, whatever you are shopping for, you will definitely be spoiled for choice and will want to pick up every pair. Our range of heels will surely blow your mind, and whether you are shopping for high heels and heels sandals online or at our stores, we will make sure you find the perfect pair!

**Tips to keep in mind when buying Sneakers for Women**

A quick guide to shopping casual shirts for men
When you grow up into a young professional, you slowly realise that you cannot wear a t-shirt everywhere. But what’s fun and chilled out like a t-shirt, but doesn’t look as informal as one? Casual shirts for men. Casual shirts can be of various kinds and styles, full-sleeves or half, in a variety of prints and fabrics, and can be paired and layered with different kinds of tees, trousers and jackets. Honestly, if you search for mens casual shirts online, you will find a bunch of inspirations on how you can style casual shirts for men. And, when you are searching for the best casual shirts for men, Westside is the perfect destination for online shopping site in India for a wide range of cool casual shirts in a variety of styles, in the latest trends, and in every colour and print you can imagine. So, whether you are shopping for mens casual shirts online or at our store, you will be bowled over by all the options we have to offer.
Different kinds of casual shirts for men
Now, when you think of casual shirts for men, do you only imagine boring half-sleeve shirts that hang from your shoulders without any shape or form? Well, it’s time to change your mind, my friend. Today, casual shirts form the maximum chunk of a man’s wardrobe purely based on versatility and almost every other day, men buy casual shirts online. For starters, casual shirts come in a variety of fabrics, which take the shape of your torso, ensuring a smart and shapely fit, making you look sharp and confident. Secondly, you can wear a casual shirt as a layer over t-shirts, along with your favourite denim jeans, for a cool street-forward look. The best casual shirts for men these days, are those that can be worn in various ways. Wear them as is, or as a layer, or under your favourite jacket – the world’s your oyster. Definitely check out mens casual shirts online for ideas on how to work with contrasts and textures. Also, the best casual shirts for men are also those that stand out and make an impression. Unlike formal shirts, casual shirts for men don’t have to be muted or understated. Make them statement and don’t be afraid to wear your personality on your sleeve. This is an opportunity for you to play with prints, fabrics, and sleeve styles.
How to shop for casual shirts for men online?
When you are shopping casual shirts for men online, always check the site’s size chart to make sure you are selecting the right size. Having said that, you should also check out oversized casual shirts for men online on social media to understand how you can wear the trend. At Westside, whether you buy casual shirts online or at our stores, we aim to impress you with our variety of options. If while scrolling for casual shirts for men online you come across a style you like, in all probability, we will have an option at Westside. So, walk into our stores or buy casual shirts online from our wide range of exciting and trending collections.

A style guide for sweatshirts for mens
A sweatshirt might be seen as a simple piece of clothing but it is an extremely versatile garment in a man’s wardrobe. Think about it: Sweatshirt for mens can be worn just by themselves, as a part of various casual outfits, or with a variety of layers, and can even be incorporated into formal wear. It would be great if you check out how celebrities and fashion influencers are styling sweatshirts for mens online on social media to understand different ways in which you can wear this garment. Styling sweatshirts for mens is the most important confusion that most men have. Sweatshirts are not sweaters or pullovers, unlike what most people think. Don’t make that mistake. At Westside, whether you are shopping mens sweatshirts online or at our stores, you will be blown away by the wide range of options that we have for you.
Different styles of sweatshirts for mens
If you think that sweatshirts are only crew neck full-sleeve t-shirts, it’s time you changed that opinion. At Westside, we also have a variety of hoodies sweatshirts for mens which look great by themselves, but can also be worn under layers like blazers and jackets.
How to style sweatshirts for mens
For starters, invest in basic sweatshirts that can be worn with anything. Sweatshirts look great solo, with just your favourite pair of denims, or chinos. For a cool layer, style them with denim trucker jackets. If you want a warmer option, wear them with a knit blazer or a think knitted cardigan. For max warmth, sweatshirts go perfectly with leather jackets and trench coats. Printed and textured sweatshirts can be styled in similar a fashion, and you should check out how influencers and styling mens sweatshirts online. It is everybody’s favourite menswear garment on the internet! If you are styling an all-over printed sweatshirt, like a tie & dye sweatshirt, for example, it is important to understand contrast and colours, and what colours would perfectly complement the sweatshirt. The easiest way out is to pick a dark layer. Black and deep blue or deep green will go with practically every outfit. You can also play the co-ord game and get matching bottoms with the sweatshirt, and wear a layer in a matching colour too. Need inspo on how to ace co-ords? Check out celebrities and how they are styling sweatshirts for mens online on social media. Hoodie sweatshirts for mens look really cool with jackets, and K-dramas has made this a popular style code for men. Buy Polo T shirts for Men Online at Best Prices
Polo t shirts for men are the coolest wardrobe basics to own
When it comes to casual wear, men don’t necessarily have a lot of options. Women have a wide range of options in casual wear, whereas men are left with t shirts and casual shirts. That’s about it, right? And for men who are not necessarily comfortable wear crew neck t shirts as a part of a casual ensemble, the options dwindle even further. That’s wear mens polo t shirts come into the picture. For starters, mens polo t shirts have an unnecessarily incorrect connotation attached to it that it is a garment only older men prefer. That is quite untrue. While older men have preferred the polo t shirt most popularly, younger men are taking to it too, because thanks to a variety of new styling options, polo tshirts for men can be a cool casual wear option. At Westside, whether you are shopping mens polo t shirts online or at our stores, rest assured that you will always find a wide range of options, styles, colours, and prints to choose from.
How to style polo t shirts for men
Are there different ways to style polo t shirts for men? Absolutely. You don’t have to wear them over your denims and look like slouchy and unkempt. Let’s introduce you to casual wear tailored shorts. Mens polo t shirts go really well with tailored shorts. Tuck them in, loop through a braided belt, and step into a smart pair of espadrilles and you are ready for brunch or a lunch date. Or a hang out with your buddies and some golf clubs on a weekend maybe? Mens polo t shirts and shorts are a perfect daytime ensemble. Next, you can also style them with stylish trousers in interesting textures. Choose linen pants, for example, and pair them with a bright polo t shirt. Slick your hair back and wear your favourite aviators, and you will definitely make heads turn. What is crucial while shopping for mens polo t shirts online or at stores is to ensure that it fits you perfectly. Do not buy mens polo t shirts in a bigger size. They need to sit like second skin on your shoulders and chest, for maximum impact. For guys who workout regularly, the polo t shirt really flatters a toned torso. Also, it is important to remember that younger men don’t need to wear pastels when it comes to polos. Pick bright colours that stand out, and make you look smart and cheerful. And you can also check out micro stripes or micro prints, or collars in contrasting colours. Polo t shirts for men are not as boring as they used to be, and at Westside, we bring you the most stylish options always.
Shopping polo t shirts for men at Westside
At Westside, you will be blown away by the wide variety of mens polo t shirts we have at our stores and on the website. Check out mens polo t shirts online on social media for styling ideas and come over to Westside – we’ll help you put together the coolest looks that you want to wear every day, everywhere.

text:
Buy Chino Pants for Men Online at Best Prices from Westside
Shopping for casual trousers and chinos for men
A lot of men tend to think that all kinds of trousers are the same and can be worn interchangeably. That there isn’t any difference between formal trousers and mens casual trousers. Now, that is a misconception which needs to be changed. Formal trousers and mens casual trousers are definitely two separate categories, which is specifically defined by the difference in style, fit, construction, and colour choices. For a few decades, chinos for men have been the most popular casual trousers option. At Westside, we have two separate dedicated sections for formal trousers and chinos for men. But before you shop, definitely check out casual trousers for mens online on Instagram and social media to get an idea of the varieties available, and all the different ways in which you can wear and style them.
What’s the difference between formals and chinos for men?
There is a typical difference in the fabric of choice, for starters. Formal trousers are created with various cotton blends, as formal trousers require an easier flow, and are necessarily not form-fit. Formal trousers can have a variety of textures, which can be created with cotton-silk or cotton-wool blends. Formal trousers are also created with linen and khaki. Chinos for men is a twill fabric that was originally a 100% cotton fabric, but have a variety of cotton-synthetic blends these days to create different kinds of fits, because casual trousers can be form-fit, and have skinnier or tapering constructions, unlike formal trousers. Also, while formal trousers do have a wide range of colours and tones today, mens casual trousers really explore the gamut of colours and shades, as more and more men are experimenting with brighter and interesting colours these days. So, from popping reds to shades of green and blue, and even yellow and neon colours, you will find mens casual trousers in any colour you want. For more styling ideas, definitely check out casual trousers for mens online on social media to see how celebrities and influencers are wearing them around the world. 
What the origin story of chinos for men?
Why are chinos, well, called “chinos”? The cotton twill fabric was originally made in China, which was heavily used for the uniforms of Spanish and American armies who waged wars in the south east Asian colonies they occupied. When these soldiers went back to their countries, the fabric travelled with them, and trickled into civilian clothing. The Spanish referred to pants made with the fabric “pantalones chinos” or Chinese pants, and that stuck. 
Shopping chinos for men and mens casual trousers at Westside 
Whether you are shopping casual trousers for mens online or at our stores, at Westside, our wide selection in different colours and fits will definitely blow your mind. You will find a fit and style for every outfit, and for every occasion. After checking out our mens casual trousers collection, you can then pick shirts or t-shirts or jackets to pair with them, to put together a cool new look that you will want to live in. So, come to Westside, and we’ll make sure you leave looking like a million bucks.

# Buy Chino Pants for Men Online at Best Prices from Westside

**Shopping for casual trousers and chinos for men**

A lot of men tend to think that all kinds of trousers are the same and can be worn interchangeably. That there isn’t any difference between [**formal trousers**](https://www.westside.com/collections/formal-trousers-for-men) and mens casual trousers. Now, that is a misconception which needs to be changed. Formal trousers and mens casual trousers are definitely two separate categories, which is specifically defined by the difference in style, fit, construction, and colour choices. For a few decades, chinos for men have been the most popular casual trousers option. At Westside, we have two separate dedicated sections for formal trousers and chinos for men. But before you shop, definitely check out casual trousers for mens online on Instagram and social media to get an idea of the varieties available, and all the different ways in which you can wear and style them.

**What’s the difference between formals and chinos for men?**

There is a typical difference in the fabric of choice, for starters. Formal trousers are created with various cotton blends, as formal trousers require an easier flow, and are necessarily not form-fit. Formal trousers can have a variety of textures, which can be created with cotton-silk or cotton-wool blends. Formal trousers are also created with linen and khaki. Chinos for men is a twill fabric that was originally a 100% cotton fabric, but have a variety of cotton-synthetic blends these days to create different kinds of fits, because casual trousers can be form-fit, and have skinnier or tapering constructions, unlike formal trousers. Also, while formal trousers do have a wide range of colours and tones today, mens casual trousers really explore the gamut of colours and shades, as more and more men are experimenting with brighter and interesting colours these days. So, from popping reds to shades of green and blue, and even yellow and neon colours, you will find mens casual trousers in any colour you want. For more styling ideas, definitely check out casual trousers for mens online on social media to see how celebrities and influencers are wearing them around the world.

**What the origin story of chinos for men?**

Why are chinos, well, called “chinos”? The cotton twill fabric was originally made in China, which was heavily used for the uniforms of Spanish and American armies who waged wars in the south east Asian colonies they occupied. When these soldiers went back to their countries, the fabric travelled with them, and trickled into civilian clothing. The Spanish referred to pants made with the fabric “pantalones chinos” or Chinese pants, and that stuck.

**Shopping chinos for men and mens casual trousers at Westside**

Whether you are shopping casual trousers for mens online or at our stores, at [**Westside**](https://www.westside.com/), our wide selection in different colours and fits will definitely blow your mind. You will find a fit and style for every outfit, and for every occasion. After checking out our mens casual trousers collection, you can then pick [**shirts**](https://www.westside.com/collections/formal-shirts-for-men) or [**t-shirts**](https://www.westside.com/collections/t-shirts-for-men) or [**jackets**](https://www.westside.com/collections/jackets-for-men) to pair with them, to put together a cool new look that you will want to live in. So, come to Westside, and we’ll make sure you leave looking like a million bucks.

text:
Buy Formal Trousers for Men Online at Best Prices from Westside
Things to keep in mind when shopping for men formal trousers
While all of us would love to live in our denims, we know that we need to have a bigger collection of men formal trousers because that is what we need to wear every day. Formal trousers for men are work wear must-haves, and it is extremely important to have a good selection of trousers for men in your wardrobe. Most people make the mistake of having just a few basics and think that will be enough, but soon realise that a wide variety is required to go with different shirts and blazers. When shopping formal trousers for men, always remember that fit, trouser length, and colour, are the three most crucial parameters for buying trousers for men. At Westside, whether you are shopping formal trousers for men online or at our stores, we will always have a wide selection of formal trousers for men for you, in a variety of colours, different styles of tapering, and in stylish textures and gradients. 
How to navigate the parameters while shopping formal trousers for men
Let’s start with colour. Gone are the days of boring blacks and browns. While they are your basics and you should definitely have a few options in each, men formal trousers come in a wide range of colours these days that are accepted in workplaces and are appreciated by everybody. Try various shades of blue and green, and a spectrum of tan. Wear deeper shades during weekdays, and shift to cooler pastels on Fridays or for work meetings and lunches maybe? Also, beige is not just one shade. While many think that beige is boring, it completely depends on the shade you pick, and the shirt and jacket you wear it with. A well-fitted pair of tan men formal trousers for men with a classic white shirt and a dark blue or green blazer with a pop-print pocket square is dapper central. Along with colour, don’t forget to experiment with patterns. Stripes and checks maybe? Why not? Start with smaller patterns and then, if you feel confident, and the occasion calls for it, go bold. At Westside, we have a variety of fits for formal trousers for men, so you can pick whichever works for you. Go slim and tapered or keep it regular and straight, find what’s comfortable for you. Now, we come to the tricky one – pant length. When it comes to formal trousers for men, there are two rules: The conventional, and the modern. The conventional rule for pant length is a slight break or fold of the fabric on the shoe in the front of the trouser leg, while the modern rule - keeping with shorter pant legs across categories – doesn’t require a break and can end right above the shoe to form a clean, straight look. Pick whichever you are comfortable with. Before shopping, check out formal trousers for men online on social media and see how both the lengths look and take a call accordingly. 
Why you’ll love men formal trousers from Westside
Not only do we have a wide range of colour and fit options, Westside’s formal trousers for men have exceptional quality and are perfect for daily use. So, whether you are shopping formal trousers for men online on our website or in our stores, we’ll a bunch of options that you will definitely fall in love with.

text:
Buy Formal Shirts for Men Online at Best Prices from Westside
What are the qualities of a perfect mens formal shirt?
The most important garment in any man’s wardrobe is the mens formal shirt. Nobody is going to argue with that. The mens formal shirt is the most used garment in a man’s wardrobe, and is worn every day. It is of daily requirement, which is why every man should have a wide variety of formal shirts. But, we must understand that formal shirts don’t have to be boring. Formal shirts can be of a variety of styles, in various colours and prints, and most importantly, needs to fit you like a dream. Honestly, nothing looks better on a man that a well-fitted, sharply-constructed, mens formal shirt. And, when you are searching for the best formal shirts for men, Westside is the perfect one-stop destination for a wide range of formal shirts in a variety of styles, in the latest trends, and in every colour and print you can imagine. So, whether you are shopping for a mens formal shirt online or at our store, you will be bowled over by all the options we have to offer. 
Things to keep in mind when shopping for a mens formal shirt
Firstly, whether you are shopping for a mens formal shirt online or at our stores, it is important to have clarity on what the shirt is for. Are you buying a formal shirt for daily wear to work, or is this a Friday semi-formal option? Do you need a formal shirt for a special formal event or are you looking for the best formal shirts for men for that very important interview or presentation where you have to make a lasting impression? It is important to understand that “formal shirt” doesn’t mean only one kind of shirt. If you search for options for mens formal shirt online on social media, you will get an idea on the different kinds of formal shirts, and the various occasions they are appropriate for. For example, daily work wear requires formal shirts that are muted, in pastels, and pair well with blazers and jackets. If you choose to wear checks, don’t pick big and bold options. Smaller checks in softer colours are the best bet. If you want to wear prints, subtle micro-prints are favoured by most companies. You can be a little adventurous on Fridays and choose to play with deeper or brighter colours. For events and occasions, invest in interesting fabrics which add texture to the shirt, and make you stand out. Secondly, always shop for a mens formal shirt keeping the colour of the suit jacket or blazer in mind. Thirdly, the best formal shirts for men are the ones that are constructed to fit your frame like it was tailored for you. Check construction and tailoring, and always remember that you should wear shirts to size. Don’t wear bigger sizes because they make you look dishevelled and unprofessional. Even if you work out regularly, don’t wear muscle fits because they are not appreciated in the workplace. 
Shopping for mens formal shirt at Westside
Whether you want to buy formal shirts online or at our stores, you will find a wide range of options that will surely wow you. Westside has the best formal shirts for men in a variety of cuts, prints, and colours. Also, before you buy formal shirts online platforms like Instagram and Pinterest are great places to find inspiration on what’s hot these days, styles that are trending, and how can you pair a mens formal shirt with different suits and jackets. And before you buy formal shirts online, be very sure of the size you wear, so that you can pick the perfect option for that next board meeting you need to rock.

# Buy Formal Shirts for Men Online at Best Prices from Westside

**What are the qualities of a perfect mens formal shirt?**

The most important garment in any man’s wardrobe is the mens formal shirt. Nobody is going to argue with that. The mens formal shirt is the most used garment in a man’s wardrobe, and is worn every day. It is of daily requirement, which is why every man should have a wide variety of formal shirts. But, we must understand that formal shirts don’t have to be boring. Formal shirts can be of a variety of styles, in various colours and prints, and most importantly, needs to fit you like a dream. Honestly, nothing looks better on a man that a well-fitted, sharply-constructed, mens formal shirt. And, when you are searching for the best formal shirts for men, Westside is the perfect one-stop destination for a wide range of formal shirts in a variety of styles, in the latest trends, and in every colour and print you can imagine. So, whether you are shopping for a mens formal shirt online or at our store, you will be bowled over by all the options we have to offer.

**Things to keep in mind when shopping for a mens formal shirt**

Firstly, whether you are shopping for a mens formal shirt online or at our stores, it is important to have clarity on what the shirt is for. Are you buying a formal shirt for daily wear to work, or is this a Friday semi-formal option? Do you need a formal shirt for a special formal event or are you looking for the best formal shirts for men for that very important interview or presentation where you have to make a lasting impression? It is important to understand that “formal shirt” doesn’t mean only one kind of shirt. If you search for options for mens formal shirt online on social media, you will get an idea on the different kinds of formal shirts, and the various occasions they are appropriate for. For example, daily work wear requires formal shirts that are muted, in pastels, and pair well with [**blazers**](https://www.westside.com/collections/blazers-for-men) and [**jackets**](https://www.westside.com/collections/jackets-for-men). If you choose to wear checks, don’t pick big and bold options. Smaller checks in softer colours are the best bet. If you want to wear prints, subtle micro-prints are favoured by most companies. You can be a little adventurous on Fridays and choose to play with deeper or brighter colours. For events and occasions, invest in interesting fabrics which add texture to the shirt, and make you stand out. Secondly, always shop for a mens formal shirt keeping the colour of the suit jacket or blazer in mind. Thirdly, the best formal shirts for men are the ones that are constructed to fit your frame like it was tailored for you. Check construction and tailoring, and always remember that you should wear shirts to size. Don’t wear bigger sizes because they make you look dishevelled and unprofessional. Even if you work out regularly, don’t wear muscle fits because they are not appreciated in the workplace.

**Shopping for mens formal shirt at Westside**

Whether you want to buy formal shirts online or at our stores, you will find a wide range of options that will surely wow you. [**Westside**](https://www.westside.com/) has the best formal shirts for men in a variety of cuts, prints, and colours. Also, before you buy formal shirts online platforms like Instagram and Pinterest are great places to find inspiration on what’s hot these days, styles that are trending, and how can you pair a mens formal shirt with different suits and jackets. And before you buy formal shirts online, be very sure of the size you wear, so that you can pick the perfect option for that next board meeting you need to rock.

**Buy Ethnic Suits for Women Online**

Ethnic suits for women and Indianwear makes up one of the most important parts of a woman’s wardrobe. From kurtas and Indianwear suits for women to anarkali for women and glamorous ethnic set for women, there is always so much variety and so many options when it comes to Indianwear. You can choose from everyday kurtas and kurtis, festive anarkali dress for women and long kurtas, to fabulously regal long kurtas and lehengas. Ethnic suits for women come in a variety of styles because ethnic set for women have multiple utilisations – from work to brunch, festive occasions to family get-togethers – and hence, form a very crucial part of anybody’s wardrobe. At Westside, we have a variety of options for Indianwear and our collections will definitely blow your mind. From long kurtas to anarkali for women, short kurtis, Indian skirts and stunning festive anarkali dress for women, you will fall in love with everything we have to offer! Along with variety, we also offer Indianwear options for various occasions. Do you need Indianwear options for work? From solids to muted prints, our workwear appropriate range of kurtas will definitely win your favour. Need brunch ideas, or want to keep it easy-Indian for family occasions? Check out our elegant range of kurtas, sets, and suits for women. For festive and celebration options, be ready to have your mind blown with exquisite embroidery, sheer dupattas, fantastic prints, gold embellishing, and absolutely statement Indianwear pieces. Along with Indianwear wardrobe options, don’t forget to check out our range of jewellery, accessories, bags, and shoes, to build a look from scratch.

**How to shop for Ethnic Suits for women**

Kurtas, suits, or ethnic set for women come in a variety of options. Firstly, make sure that you shop according to occasion. If you are shopping Indianwear for a wedding, you can choose between a kurta set of an anarkali for women. But for work or brunch, an anarkali dress for women might not be a great idea. So, while shopping for ethnic suits for women, it is very crucial that you plan the outfit according to the occasion. Secondly, when you are shopping for an ethnic set for women, decide what the style of the kurta or the anarkali for women will be. Do you want a heavily embellished option for an up-glam festive or wedding situation, or are you looking for sober, muted varieties? At Westside, whether you are shopping for kurtis or anarkali dress for women, we stock options for every variety, so that you have exactly what you need for every occasion.

**Shopping Ethnic Suits for women at Westside**

At Westside, our wide range of kurtas, ethnic set for women, and anarkali dress for women will definitely be your favourite collections of Indianwear. From your favourite colours to prints, embellishing to embroidery, from kurtas sets to regal-looking anarkali for women, our options in Indianwear will definitely make jaws drop. Ultra-chic, elegant, modern fusion, or classic favourites, whatever your personal style is, at Westside, you will definitely find Indianwear options that will celebrate you!

It’s commonly said that Indian women look the prettiest in Indian ethnic dresses. There’s a different charm to it, an unparalleled beauty in ethnic dresses that can make every woman look elegant and captivating. In India, every region has its own style of ethnic dresses for women. Up north, you will find ethnic dresses in kaftan styles, or pherans, with delicate embroidery around the neckline, while the western regions celebrate full-outfit needle work of various kinds, along with a variety of block prints. Central India celebrates the Anarkali with its heavily-pleated body, often decked with embroidery, worn with churidars or wide-hemmed pants, adorned with “Chikankari” thread work, famous of the Lucknow region.
Indian ethnic dresses celebrate Indian textiles
Indian ethnic dresses truly have a vast range of textiles to choose from. Can we just take a moment to discuss the treasure trove that is this country’s fabrics? From soft cottons to rich silks, indigenous and regional weaves like tussar and kotki, chanderi and ikkat, to decadent muslins and cotton-silk blends, no country can boast of a wider selection of fabrics and textiles, which makes Indian ethnic dresses for women such a rich combination of tradition, art, history, heritage, and artisanship.

Always remember that different ethnic dresses suit different occasions. Buying skirts for women can be a zero-hassle affair!
Skirts might just be the favourite and most common womenswear garment across all ages, across the globe. If you think about it, the skirt is available in almost every country in some form. Obviously, the West has a bunch of varieties of skirts for women, from mini skirts to knee-lengths, and even longer styles, and skirts come in various cuts and styles, in every fabric you can think off. Women skirts are also possibly the most versatile garment. Wear it with tops and shirts, wear it as a formal outfit or a casual attire, skirts can be styled however you want to. In the East, versions of skirts exist everywhere. From the half-skirt of southern India, to wraparounds in southeast Asian countries, from the gorgeous lehengas to straight skirts of Japan and Korea, various iterations of the skirts exist here too. 
But how do you shop for the best skirts for women?
For starters, whether you are shopping skirts for women online or at a store, it is important to understand that the primary feature of the skirt is that it should flatter you. So, it is important to choose women skirts according to the cut. Do you want a sharp and slim-fitted skirt that flaunts your shape, or would you prefer something more flowy, with a lot of room and ruffles? Then, you need to decide the length, and that decision is connected to what occasion or activity you are purchasing the skirt for. Skirts for women generally are formal and casual, but there are a bunch of varieties within this segregation too. Formal skirts can be of various lengths, so choose appropriately. Also, formal skirts are generally form-fitted, and come in muted and professional colours. With casual women skirts, the options are endless. For parties and night outs, pick minis and micro-minis, in pleather or denim, if you want that biker chick vibe. For beach vacays, choose longer easy-beezy balloon-y skirts in light fabrics and graphic or floral prints. Pick knee-length skirts for casual hangs, brunches, Friday dressing, and so on, and at Westside, any style you can think of, is available. Whether you are shopping skirts for women online or on ground, all the options are available everywhere. 
Can palazzos be an alternative for skirts for women?
Palazzos or what’s often called plazos for women, has become a hot fashion favourite in the country for a while now. For starters, they are outrageously comfortable, and if you want to wear something casual and voluminous, but don’t necessary feel like a skirt, plazos for women is a great option. The breadth of the hem varies, from extra-wide options which have a more casual vibe to it, to straighter and slimmer fits which can easily fit into work wear wardrobes too. Also, plazos for women in basic solids are a great alternative to womens churidars and womens salwars too as a part of Indian ethnic wear outfits. At Westside, there are options galore, in every style and colour you can think of. When shopping for them, or skirts for women online, it’s imperative to remember to choose fits that work for you and make you feel good and look good.

At Westside, there are options galore, in every style and colour you can think of. When shopping for them, or skirts for women online, it’s imperative to remember to choose fits that work for you and make you feel good and look good.

NEW IN FOR PLUS-SIZE WOMEN
Buy the latest trends in plus-size clothing
In the fashion market, finding trendy and fashion-forward plus-size clothing for a curvaceous body can sometimes be a struggle. Westside has been successful in serving up trend-savvy, statement-making pieces and creating the ultimate fashion-forward, trend-conscious plus-size clothing—like tops, curve-hugging dresses, and flattering silhouettes. It is a breath of fresh air in the fashion industry where it is not typical to find many options in plus-size clothing for the majority, especially the ones that are aligned with the latest trends that everyone’s been talking about.
Explore our wide range of plus-size clothing, now available both in-store, online, and on the app. There are pants for women, T-shirts and tops, plus-size dresses for women, and much more. With an extensive range of silhouettes, prints, and colours, the options for you to choose from are limitless. We have just the right style solutions for curvy women who would like to wear fashionable plus-size clothing to match their fashion sense and style statements.
Plus-size clothing is in great demand; with plus-size tops for women, curvy trousers, chic plus-size dresses for women, and more, we at Westside have positioned ourselves as an ideal choice for plus-size clothing wear shops. The categories and style range that we provide are wide and keep on expanding. Plus-size clothing is not at all about feeling comfortable in your body. It's all about flaunting your body in a more stylish and sophisticated way.
Over the past seasons, we have been providing our consumers with some really stylish, chic, and flattering clothing for plus-size women. And there is more to come with every new launch! All you have to do is choose what you want to buy—the choices are endless. You can also elevate your looks by accessorising with a stylish bag for women, captivating jewellery, and a makeup look that goes with the mood. Plus-size clothing for women is designed to make you feel comfortable and fashionable. The pieces in plus sizes are also available in ethnic wear such as kurtas, ethnic bottoms, and much more. Plus-size clothing for a special evening is also readily available at our website, app, and stores.
Shop the latest looks in women's plus-size clothing at Westside, starting from trendy plus-size tops for women and sleek pants to plus-size dresses and casual t-shirts for women. At Westside, we aspire to create versatile styles and fits that are made to give you the confidence to step out in style to work, play, and everything in between. We have designed our fashion pieces in a way that no matter your size, body shape, or style, it’s easy to find the perfect women’s plus-size clothing that suits your mood and the occasion. We have got you covered no matter the occasion or size you’re shopping for. It’s easy to feel fabulous when you shop the latest style launches that we have curated for you!

**NEW IN FOR PLUS-SIZE WOMEN**

Buy the latest trends in plus-size clothing

In the fashion market, finding trendy and fashion-forward plus-size clothing for a curvaceous body can sometimes be a struggle. Westside has been successful in serving up trend-savvy, statement-making pieces and creating the ultimate fashion-forward, trend-conscious plus-size clothing—like tops, curve-hugging dresses, and flattering silhouettes. It is a breath of fresh air in the fashion industry where it is not typical to find many options in plus-size clothing for the majority, especially the ones that are aligned with the latest trends that everyone’s been talking about.

Explore our wide range of plus-size clothing, now available both in-store, online, and on the app. There are pants for women, T-shirts and tops, **[plus-size dresses for women](https://www.westside.com/collections/dresses-for-plus-size-women)**, and much more. With an extensive range of silhouettes, prints, and colours, the options for you to choose from are limitless. We have just the right style solutions for curvy women who would like to wear fashionable plus-size clothing to match their fashion sense and style statements.

Plus-size clothing is in great demand; with plus-size tops for women, curvy trousers, chic plus-size dresses for women, and more, we at Westside have positioned ourselves as an ideal choice for plus-size clothing wear shops. The categories and style range that we provide are wide and keep on expanding. Plus-size clothing is not at all about feeling comfortable in your body. It's all about flaunting your body in a more stylish and sophisticated way.

Over the past seasons, we have been providing our consumers with some really stylish, chic, and flattering clothing for plus-size women. And there is more to come with every new launch! All you have to do is choose what you want to buy—the choices are endless. You can also elevate your looks by accessorising with a stylish bag for women, captivating jewellery, and a makeup look that goes with the mood. Plus-size clothing for women is designed to make you feel comfortable and fashionable. The pieces in plus sizes are also available in ethnic wear such as kurtas, **[ethnic bottoms](https://www.westside.com/collections/utsa-women-ethnic-bottom)**, and much more. Plus-size clothing for a special evening is also readily available at our website, app, and stores.

Shop the latest looks in women's plus-size clothing at Westside, starting from trendy plus-size tops for women and sleek pants to plus-size dresses and casual t-shirts for women. At Westside, we aspire to create versatile styles and fits that are made to give you the confidence to step out in style to work, play, and everything in between. We have designed our fashion pieces in a way that no matter your size, body shape, or style, it’s easy to find the perfect **[women’s plus-size clothing](https://www.westside.com/collections/view-all-plus-size-for-women)** that suits your mood and the occasion. We have got you covered no matter the occasion or size you’re shopping for. It’s easy to feel fabulous when you shop the latest style launches that we have curated for you!

A guide to shopping the perfect dresses for plus size women
In western wear, for women, dresses are definitely the most important garment in a woman’s wardrobe. Also, given the variety and styles of dresses for womens that are available today, it is an absolute joy to shop for them. But, if you are a curvy woman and want to flaunt your curves with confidence, don’t worry, plus size dresses can be of various kinds and varieties today, depending on the cut, style, and occasion. Curvy women don’t have to hide themselves anymore under piles of layers, thanks to a wide range of dresses for plus size women. Check out party wear dresses for womens that can be shorter in length, with deeper and more adventurous necklines, and in statement fabrics like velour or satin, and shine like the star of the evening. Whether you are shopping plus size womens dresses online or at stores, Westside has a wide range collection for curvy women like tshirts . tops , jeans and many more in every style possible. Both at stores or online, dresses for plus size women are the fastest-selling garments and you will not be disappointed with the collections we have in store for you. Also, if you are not looking for party wear dresses for womens, there are other options too. Flowy and easy-breezy long dresses for women who are curvy and confident, are perfect for casual brunches or beach vacations. When shopping for dresses, summer dresses are a huge hit in India. If you want to be adventurous, shorter and body-hugging plus size dresses for womens can be stylishly paired with thigh-high boots and leather or faux fur jackets. For curvy women, formal long dresses for women are great alternatives to high-maintenance gowns and make you look absolutely stunning without the hassle. But, there surely are a few things to keep in mind when shopping for plus size western dresses for womens.
What to remember when shopping dresses for plus size women
Most importantly, when buying plus size women dresses online weather is a major factor to keep in mind. Shop accordingly. Secondly, what is the event or occasion you are shopping for? Plus size western dresses for womens are very occasion-specific. You cannot wear a beach dress to a party. You cannot wear an LBD to a formal evening. So, when you are shopping western dresses for womens, shop according to the occasion. Thirdly, there are a variety of plus size long dresses for women, but you need to recognise the style and cut of the dress and shop according to your requirement. The dress has to fit you – you don’t need to fit the dress. Ignore trends and wear what makes you comfortable and feel like the goddess you are! The same goes for plus size party wear dresses for womens. What kind of a party is it? Is it a casual hangout with the girls or a formal cocktail evening where you might need to network, and will be required to make an impression? Shop intelligently. Fourthly, when shopping for plus size dresses for womens, the neckline is a crucial aspect to keep in mind. How risqué do you want to be? Additionally, the neckline will also depend on the event and the people you are going to be with. You might be needed to wear a cocktail dress, but it could still be a formal event. But, don’t worry, at Westside, shop hundreds of options for plus size womens dresses online and at the stores and we promise you that you will be bowled over. Shopping for dresses for plus size women had never been this fun and easy!

Plus Size Wear For Woman – Westside
Why shopping for plus size women does not need to be a hassle anymore
For the longest time, curvy women have had a tough time shopping for the perfect outfits for themselves. But not anymore. Today, you can flaunt your curves however you want to, with confidence, and celebrate your body with fabulous collections of trending fashion for curvy women at Westside!
How to shop for dresses for plus size women?
When buying dresses for plus size women, the weather is a major factor to keep in mind. Shop accordingly. Secondly, what is the event or occasion you are shopping for? Plus size western dresses for womens are very occasion-specific. You cannot wear a beach dress to a party. You cannot wear an LBD to a formal evening. So, when you are shopping western dresses for womens, shop according to the occasion. Thirdly, there are a variety of long dresses for plus size women, but you need to recognise the style and cut of the dress and shop according to your requirement. The dress has to fit you – you don’t need to fit the dress. Wear what makes you comfortable and feel like the goddess you are! The same goes for party dresses for plus size women. What kind of a party is it? Is it a casual hangout with the girls or a formal cocktail evening where you might need to network, and will be required to make an impression? Always shop intelligently.
Are jumpsuits for plus size women a great alternative to dresses?
Plus size jumpsuits are a great alternative for casual western dresses, and whether you are shopping plus size jumpsuits for womens online or at our stores, remember that the fit is crucial. Baggier fits don’t generally work for jumpsuits for plus size women, so make sure you pick one that is exactly in your size, that confidently and beautifully lets you flaunt your curves. Also, for colder months, you can always layer your jumpsuit with jackets, to add that cool-chick factor to the outfit. For the longest time, jumpsuits for plus size women have been a favourite with curvy women because they are snug and comfy, oh-so-stylish, and extremely versatile. You can wear jumpsuits for women to practically any formal or casual occasion if you style it properly. Also, for curvy queens who might still be a little conscious of their bodies, jumpsuits for plus size women can be a great addition to your wardrobes. Due to the garment being one-piece, it helps in creating an illusion of slimness, and takes away the focus from common problem areas.
What kind of tops for plus size women are you looking for?
Let’s start with the most common requirement –plus size womens western tops who go to the office every day. You are obviously looking for women’s formal tops. Formal-style womens western tops for plus size women come in various colours, prints, and styles. You can choose from a wide range of solids, which pair wonderfully with blazers and jackets, or select formal tops for plus size women in stripes or checks. For curvy women, it is advisable to choose vertical stripes in dark colours (which is also a great nugget of advice when shopping solids) to create an illusion of slimness. This works great with shorter women too. When shopping for western tops for plus size women, be it formal or casual, you have both summer and winter options. For the winter weathers, choose knitted plus size women’s casual tops. For the summers and for daily loungewear, feel free to choose graphic-printed tops, longline styles, and other plus size women’s casual tops in a wide variety of silhouettes and constructions that can be worn for any occasion or activity you like. Also, when you are shopping for casual tops for plus size women, or whatever kind of plus size ladies tops for that matter, it is always important to first zero in on the occasion or activity you are shopping for.
Various kinds of t shirts for plus size women
We need to clear the air about one problematic misconception: t shirts for ladies can be more than just round neck crew tees. Curvy women who want to flaunt their curves with confidence and style, have a wide range of options these days. Whenever shopping t shirts for plus size women, explore the different cuts and styles available. For starters, you obviously have your basic round neck women tshirts, but curvy goddesses should definitely go beyond that. Check out drop shoulder t-shirts for plus size women, polo tees, off-shoulder tshirts and other options. Also, check out all-over tshirt prints and text prints. Plus size t-shirts don’t just have to have a tweety bird printed on the front, right? Check out plus size t shirts for plus size women on social media to see what people are wearing these days. Taping and text prints are really trending these days. Streetwear enthusiasts love pairing baggy joggers and chunky sneakers with a text-print t shirts for plus size women. Pick graphic-printed plus size women tshirts for vacations, which can be worn with an open shirt or a jacket as a layer. Smartly pair them with your favourite skinny denims and a jacket, with some boots for company.
What to keep in mind when shopping jeans for plus size women
Buying jeans for plus size women could be a little tricky if you don’t know what you are looking for. Firstly, it is important to understand your body type and understand what style of denims will look good on you. Do you want a body-hugging fit, a regular fit, or a risqué second-skin fit? If choosing tapering styles, always remember that the right kind of tapering ladies joggers or trousers will create the illusion of length for curvy women and make you look taller and slimmer. Also, you have the option to either wear body-hugging tops or flowy fits, asymmetrical cuts, and oversized tops, because everything works with tapering bottoms. When shopping jeans for plus size women, always look for a cut that works for you shape and requirement. On the other hand, if you want easier fits, straighter cuts, and high-waisted options, tons of choices are available for you. Check out high-waisted jeans for plus size women on Instagram and see how they pair beautifully with any top as a part of any ensemble. Straighter cuts are more appropriate for work, especially for casual Fridays, while tighter fits make more sense as a part of casual and party wear.
Different kinds of jackets for plus size women
Back in the day, the only kind of jackets curvy women could find were formal blazers or shapeless denim jacket for womens. The options weren’t too stylish or fashionable. Otherwise, the other options would be winter windcheaters, which didn’t look that cool either. Not anymore. These days, you should check out the various kinds of uber-cool and trending plus size jackets for women and also check out social media to see the kinds of variety out there so that you know exactly what to shop for. For example, the various kinds of denim jackets for plus size women at Westside will surely make your jaw drop. But not just denim, the varieties are endless. Firstly, the fabrics. From cotton to knit, winter-favourite corduroy to the all-time hit, denim, from faux fur to snug cotton-blend hoodies, the choices are unending. And, how can we forget leather? Classic black leather jackets for plus size womenis a wardrobe must-have. Then, we come to styles. There are longline jackets for ladies who are curvy, shorter cropped jackets for plus size women in faux fur, trucker-style corduroy jackets, hooded jackets in solids or with textures, cropped leather jackets, hoodie-style zip-thru jackets, and of course, denim jacket for womens in different colours, styles, and textures.
How to put a look together with plus size kurtis
At Westside, you will find a wide range of plus size kurtis inprints and designs, both on ground, and also when you want to buy kurtis online. From statement prints to subtle embroidery and festive embellishing, you will definitely find your favourite plus size kurtis here. But how can you build a set with separates? The easiest way is to build a contrast. At Westside, you will find numerous palazzos, leggings, and other bottom options to pair your kurti of choice with. It is very easy to put a kurti set together if you are ready to spend some time and creativity. So, whether you shop plus size kurtis at our stores or buy plus size kurtis online, always look for the colours that work best with your choice of bottoms. At Westside, you will find all kinds of cuts and fits that flatter and celebrate your body. And, everybody knows that the coolest and latest fashion offerings are right here! From festive-ready designs to fusion plus sizekurtis, there are unlimited options everywhere. So, what are you waiting for? Check out our collections today!

Buy Plus Size T shirts for Women Online in India – Westside
All you need to know to shop t-shirts for plus size women
We live in tshirts. No one can deny that. From work to casual hangs, from semi-formal wear to lounge wear, women tshirts are your BFFs, right? We cannot have enough of them, we cannot think of our wardrobes without them, and we are constantly shopping for tshirts. While earlier, womens tshirts would be just a part of home wear, and maybe really informal casual hang outs, because women tshirts were never seen as a stylish fashion choice. But it is definitely a different world today. And we must celebrate that. There is a mind-boggling number of choices of tshirts for ladies, and they come in a variety of styles. Most importantly, t-shirts for plus size women. What is absolutely disheartening is that, for so many years and decades, curvy women have been totally ignored when it comes to fashion, and then, later, garments were created for plus size women which focused on hiding and shaming their bodies instead of celebrating them. Today, the world is a changing. Plus size womens tshirts today come in a range of colours, can be solids or printed, can be in different neckline styles and different lengths; choose polos or cropped, based on what your vibe is, or choose graphic prints or taping, if you are into street wear! How much fun is that? Basically, any style of plus size womens t-shirts you want, you will find an option today. Check out plus size women t shirt online, and you will be surprised at the variety. At Westside, there is a wide range of plus size t shirts for ladies in assorted colours, prints, and cuts. So, whether you are checking out the store, or shopping plus size t shirts for women online, you’ll find your favourites in a snap!
Various kinds of t shirts for plus size women
We need to clear the air about one problematic misconception: t shirts for ladies can be more than just round neck crew tees. Curvy women who want to flaunt their curves with confidence and style, have a wide range of options these days. Whenever shopping plus size t shirts for women online, explore the different cuts and styles available. For starters, you obviously have your basic round neck women tshirts, but curvy goddesses should definitely go beyond that. Check out drop shoulder t-shirts for plus size women, polo tees, off-shoulder tshirts and other options. Also, check out all-overtshirt prints and text prints. Plus size t-shirts don’t just have to have a tweety bird printed on the front, right? Check out plus size t shirts for women online on social media to see what people are wearing these days. Taping and text prints are really trending these days. On social media, you will find streetwear enthusiasts pairing baggy joggers and chunky sneakers with a text-print t shirt for womens online. Pick graphic-printed plus size women tshirts for vacations, which can be worn with an open shirt or a jacket as a layer. Longline plus size t-shirts are a huge trend too. Check out longline and drop shoulder plus size t shirt for womens online, and you will see that everybody’s wearing longline these days. Smartly pair them with your favourite skinny denims and a jacket, with some boots for company. So, whether you are shopping on ground or online at Westside, t-shirts for plus size women are available in your choicest styles and will become your forever favourites!

text:
Buy Plus Size Kurtis for Women Online at Best Prices
Do you know the secret to buying the best plus size kurtis?
It was around the early 2000s that kurtis for women and ethnic tops became a rage in Indian fashion, something that we must be grateful to Bollywood for. In almost every other film, the lead actresses were seen in kurtis in various cuts and silhouettes, in prints and embroideries, looking very stylish, and very cool. Be it Kareena Kapoor’s bright-coloured kurtis for women in Jab We Met, which she paired with contrasting salwars, or slim-fit and understated ethnic tops worn by Konkona Sensharma in Wake Up Sid, kurtis were a rage. They became the new trend – shorter in length, stylish, and versatile – and gave the Indian kurta a cool new spin. But, there weren’t many options for curvier women and finding the perfect kurtis for plus size women was a task. For starters, back then, nobody was creating plus size kurtis, but that is not the case anymore. At Westside, we bring you a wide range of sizes for kurtis for women, and our range of plus size kurtas is one of our hottest-selling collections. In every colour, style, cut, and print you can think of, come to Westside today to shop gorgeous and stylish kurtis for plus size women. 
What to keep in mind while shopping for plus size kurtis
For starters, for curvy women, the length of the kurti is very important, because while the choice of bottoms definitely depends on that, you also have to feel confident in the outfit. If wearing micro-short plus size ethnic tops, pair them with form-fitted denims. Mid-thigh plus size kurtis look beautiful with plazzos. Because kurtis are shorter, we recommend that you don’t wear them with churidars as that will create a top-heavy visual imbalance. Secondly, the sleeves of plus size kurtis for women are an important feature. Short tops look better with short sleeves or sleeveless altogether, if sleeveless is your vibe and you are comfortable in them. Longer plus size kurtis should ideally have three-quarter sleeves.
How to put a look together with plus size kurtis?
While we have discussed lengths, at Westside, you will find a wide range of prints and designs, both on ground, and also when you want to buy kurtis online. From statement prints to subtle embroidery and festive embellishing, you will definitely find your favourite kurtis for plus size women here. But how can you build a set with separates? The easiest way is to build a contrast. At Westside, you will find numerous salwars, leggings, and other bottom options to pair your kurti of choice with. It is very easy to put a kurti set together if you are ready to spend some time and creativity. So, whether you shop plus size kurtis at our stores or buy kurtis online, always look for the colours that work best with your choice of bottoms. It helps to build from a colour in the print, or use a metallic tone as the primary colour for the bottom. But don’t worry: if you have a busy schedule and are looking to buy the latest plus size kurtis online shopping on our website is the easiest place to shop on.
At Westside, you will find all kinds of cuts and fits that flatter and celebrate your body. And, everybody knows that the coolest and latest fashion offerings are right here! From festive-ready designs to fusion plus size kurtis, there are unlimited options everywhere. So, what are you waiting for? Check out our collections today!

text:
Buy Flat Sandals for Women Online
Buy Flat Sandals for Women Online in India
Every woman loves to shop for shoes. Aren’t we right, ladies? It is always fun to shop for footwear, and along with heels for women and sneakers, it is a good idea to also add flat sandals for women to your wardrobe. Every woman loves to shop for fancier shoes, but we forget that various kinds of sandals, like platform sandals or chunky sandals are what ladies sandals need on a regular basis to work, play dates, brunches and so on and so forth. And yeah, if you thought sandals only were of one type, you’re wrong, because they come in a variety of styles and, very honestly, everybody should have at least one to two pairs of sandals for women in every style. For starters, different kinds of flat sandals for women work with different outfits and different occasions. For example, platform sandals work for fancier occasions or functions, like a party or a really fancy evening, and are a great replacement for ladies sandals when you are dressing up in glam, while chunky sandals are a lot more versatile. You can wear them to work, but also to brunches, casual evenings, date nights, and parties. Chunkier varieties are a lot more playful and work really well with streetwear too, while flats or platforms are a great addition to western outfits and Indianwear. It is not just the style of the sandals for women but also the colour and type. It is important to have a few pairs in nudes and beige, along with options in tan and black. These are basic options that pair well with almost every outfit for ladies sandals. Then you should invest in colours that will stand out and really make a statement. Reds, pinks, greens, and neons definitely set trends. After that, you should look for embellished options with add-ons like chain links, for example. These are up-glam sandals that everyone should have a few pairs of in their wardrobe, especially for high-octane parties. Also, while shopping flat sandals for women, it is also important to build an outfit around it. At Westside, we have a wide range of options when it comes to sandals from formals to partywear, so that you can create a fantastic look all at the same time.
Different types of sandals for women
There are various kinds of sandals for women and it is very important to understand that different styles of sandals work for different occasions. Statement chunky sandals will not work for an office occasion, just like it is boring to wear beige flat sandals for women to a glamorous party. So, it is important to have various options, to wear to different functions. Beige and tan flat sandals for women or platform sandals are great options to pair with workwear. You can choose from various styles of platform sandals for women, and you can not only pair them with office wear but also with brunch outfits, casualwear for chilled out hangs, and they also pair beautifully with Indianwear. When shopping for different kinds of sandals, it also important to take the outfit and the length of the outfit into consideration, and wear pieces accordingly. Embellished sandals, or platform sandals, chunky sandals or heel ladies sandals are a great option for partywear, and you can definitely rock any outfit with them. For glam looks, choose sandal options that are statement and are not afraid to stand out. The right kind of colour or embellishing can be a strong statement feature for any outfit, and can be the highlight accessory of a party OOTD, or even an Indianwear look. It is therefore very important to choose sandals for women wisely and pair them according to your outfit.
Shopping sandals for women at Westside
With the wide range of footwear at Westside, whatever you are shopping for, you will definitely be spoiled for choice and will want to pick up every pair. Our range of flat sandals for women or ladies sandals will surely blow your mind, and whether you are shopping for platform sandals or chunky sandals, we will make sure you find the perfect pair!
