For example, platform sandals work for fancier occasions or functions, like a party or a really fancy evening, and are a great replacement for ladies sandals when you are dressing up in glam, while chunky sandals are a lot more versatile. You can wear them to work, but also to brunches, casual evenings, date nights, and parties. Chunkier varieties are a lot more playful and work really well with streetwear too, while flats or platforms are a great addition to western outfits and Indianwear. It is not just the style of the sandals for women but also the colour and type. It is important to have a few pairs in nudes and beige, along with options in tan and black. These are basic options that pair well with almost every outfit for ladies sandals. Then you should invest in colours that will stand out and really make a statement. Reds, pinks, greens, and neons definitely set trends. After that, you should look for embellished options with add-ons like chain links, for example. These are up-glam sandals that everyone should have a few pairs of in their wardrobe, especially for high-octane parties. Also, while shopping flat sandals for women, it is also important to build an outfit around it. At Westside, we have a wide range of options when it comes to sandals from formals to partywear, so that you can create a fantastic look all at the same time.  

**Different types of sandals for women**

There are various kinds of sandals for women and it is very important to understand that different styles of sandals work for different occasions. Statement chunky sandals will not work for an office occasion, just like it is boring to wear beige flat sandals for women to a glamorous party. So, it is important to have various options, to wear to different functions. Beige and tan flat sandals for women or platform sandals are great options to pair with workwear. You can choose from various styles of platform sandals for women, and you can not only pair them with office wear but also with brunch outfits, casualwear for chilled out hangs, and they also pair beautifully with Indianwear. When shopping for different kinds of sandals, it also important to take the outfit and the length of the outfit into consideration, and wear pieces accordingly. Embellished sandals, or platform sandals, chunky sandals or heel ladies sandals are a great option for partywear, and you can definitely rock any outfit with them. For glam looks, choose sandal options that are statement and are not afraid to stand out. The right kind of colour or embellishing can be a strong statement feature for any outfit, and can be the highlight accessory of a party OOTD, or even an Indianwear look. It is therefore very important to choose sandals for women wisely and pair them according to your outfit.

**Shopping sandals for women at Westside**

With the wide range of footwear at Westside, whatever you are shopping for, you will definitely be spoiled for choice and will want to pick up every pair. Our range of flat sandals for women or ladies sandals will surely blow your mind, and whether you are shopping for platform sandals or chunky sandals, we will make sure you find the perfect pair!

Shopping for the perfect western dress for women
Stylish, fashionable, and definitely statement-making, womens western wear is everybody’s wardrobe favourite. And why wouldn’t it be? The versatility and varieties available in western wear, especially ladies western wear, is mind-boggling. From skirts to tops, western dress for women, to tunics and jackets, denims and trousers, the options are endless. Western wear forms the maximum chunk of our daily wardrobes, and shopping western wear for women online or at stores, is the most fun activity ever! Girl gangs love making a day out of it. All of us have heard of shopping trips and taking a day off to go shopping. It is fun, it entertaining, and is a fantastic way to unwind. 
Womens western wear essentials
If someone was building a western wear wardrobe from scratch, what would be the building blocks? For a womens western wear wardrobe, it is important to have a selection of womens shirts and tops. Now, in ladies western wear, tops can be of various kinds. Shirts are, of course, an option. Then you have t-shirts, and tunics, and long shirts which can also work as an open layer, shackets which can work as a solo top or a layer. Secondly, when shopping for western wear for womens, invest in good dresses for every occasion. A must-buy is an LBD – the Little Black Dress. But, wait. A black western dress for women is the most versatile outfit, and doesn’t need anything else to go with it. It also, doesn’t have to necessarily be little, you know? Along with a black dress, choose dresses of different lengths, different fabrics and cuts that flatter you, and different necklines. There are a vast range of options in western wear for ladies at Westside, and you will fall in love with everything you come across. After dresses, add layers. Jackets, both light and heavy, in a variety of fabrics like cotton or denim, and even leather, are versatile ladies western wear garments, and can easily become a part of any ensemble. 
Winter western wear for ladies
Aren’t we all in love with our winter wardrobes? In western wear for womens, there are so many options for colder weathers. From jackets to knitwear to hoodies, at Westside, whether you are checking out western wear for women online on the website or in the store, you will be wowed by the options. Knitted western wear for ladies definitely are must-buys. Warm and snug jumpers, turtlenecks, knitted cardigans and sweaters, whatever you are in the mood for, is available. Jackets form a large chunk of western wear for womens, and whether you want to play it semi-formal or go full-on biker chick, name the occasion and Westside’s got an option for you. 
Womens western wear at Westside
The wide range of options in western wear for ladies at Westside will surely make you very happy. If you cannot visit a store, shop western wear for women online on the website, and add beautiful outfits to your western wear wardrobe.

    ](https://www.westside.com/products/nuon-white-typographic-t-shirt-301023388?variant=44533111226421)

**Shopping for the perfect western dress for women**

Stylish, fashionable, and definitely statement-making, [**womens western wear**](https://www.westside.com/collections/view-all-westernwear) is everybody’s wardrobe favourite. And why wouldn’t it be? The versatility and varieties available in western wear, especially ladies western wear, is mind-boggling. From [**skirts**](https://www.westside.com/collections/skirts-for-women) to [**tops**](https://www.westside.com/collections/woman-western-wear-tops), [**western dress**](https://www.westside.com/collections/dresses-for-women) for women, to tunics and [**jackets**](https://www.westside.com/collections/jackets-for-women), [**denims**](https://www.westside.com/collections/jeans-for-women) and [**trousers**](https://www.westside.com/collections/trousers-for-women), the options are endless. Western wear forms the maximum chunk of our daily wardrobes, and shopping western wear for women online or at stores, is the most fun activity ever! Girl gangs love making a day out of it. All of us have heard of shopping trips and taking a day off to go shopping. It is fun, it entertaining, and is a fantastic way to unwind.

**Womens western wear essentials**

If someone was building a western wear wardrobe from scratch, what would be the building blocks? For a womens western wear wardrobe, it is important to have a selection of womens shirts and tops. Now, in ladies western wear, tops can be of various kinds. Shirts are, of course, an option. Then you have t-shirts, and tunics, and long shirts which can also work as an open layer, shackets which can work as a solo top or a layer. Secondly, when shopping for western wear for womens, invest in good dresses for every occasion. A must-buy is an LBD – the Little Black Dress. But, wait. A black western dress for women is the most versatile outfit, and doesn’t need anything else to go with it. It also, doesn’t have to necessarily be little, you know? Along with a black dress, choose dresses of different lengths, different fabrics and cuts that flatter you, and different necklines. There are a vast range of options in western wear for ladies at Westside, and you will fall in love with everything you come across. After dresses, add layers. Jackets, both light and heavy, in a variety of fabrics like cotton or denim, and even leather, are versatile ladies western wear garments, and can easily become a part of any ensemble.

**Winter western wear for ladies**

Aren’t we all in love with our [**winter wardrobes**](https://www.westside.com/collections/winterwear-for-women)? In western wear for womens, there are so many options for colder weathers. From jackets to knitwear to hoodies, at Westside, whether you are checking out western wear for women online on the website or in the store, you will be wowed by the options. Knitted western wear for ladies definitely are must-buys. Warm and snug jumpers, turtlenecks, knitted cardigans and sweaters, whatever you are in the mood for, is available. Jackets form a large chunk of western wear for womens, and whether you want to play it semi-formal or go full-on biker chick, name the occasion and Westside’s got an option for you. 

**Womens western wear at Westside**

The wide range of options in [**western wear**](https://www.westside.com/collections/view-all-westernwear) for ladies at Westside will surely make you very happy. If you cannot visit a store, shop western wear for women online on the website, and add beautiful outfits to your western wear wardrobe.

Shorter and body-hugging dresses for womens can be stylishly paired with thigh-high boots and leather or faux fur jackets. Formal long dresses for women are great alternatives to high-maintenance gowns and make you look absolutely stunning without the hassle. But there surely are a few things to keep in mind when shopping for western dresses for womens. 
What to remember when shopping dresses for womens
Most importantly, when buying women dresses online India weather is a major factor to keep in mind. Shop accordingly. Secondly, what is the occasion you are shopping for? Western dresses for womens are very occasion-specific. You cannot wear a beach dress to a party. You cannot wear an LBD to a formal evening. So, when you are online shopping womens dresses, shop according to the occasion. Why jumpsuits for women are wardrobe must-haves
Ladies jumpsuits are extremely cool outfits that are both convenient and stylish. Stock your casual wardrobe with jumpsuits for women in solids and prints. Jumpsuits are a great alternative for casual western dresses, and whether you are shopping jumpsuits for womens online or womens dresses online, remember that the fit is crucial. Baggier fits don’t generally work for ladies jumpsuits, so make sure you pick one that is exactly in your size. Both at stores or **online shopping womens dresses** are the fastest-selling garments. But, if you are not looking for **party wear dresses for womens**, there are other options too. Flowy and easy-breezy **long dresses for women** are perfect for casual brunches or beach vacations. When shopping for **women dresses online India** loves longer summer dresses. Shorter and body-hugging **dresses for womens** can be stylishly paired with thigh-high boots and leather or faux fur jackets. Formal **long dresses for women** are great alternatives to high-maintenance gowns and make you look absolutely stunning without the hassle. But there surely are a few things to keep in mind when shopping for **western dresses for womens**. 

What to remember when shopping **dresses for womens**

Most importantly, when buying **women dresses online India** weather is a major factor to keep in mind. Shop accordingly.  Secondly, what is the occasion you are shopping for? **Western dresses for womens** are very occasion-specific. You cannot wear a beach dress to a party. You cannot wear an LBD to a formal evening. So, when you are **online shopping womens dresses**, shop according to the occasion. Secondly, there are a variety of **long dresses for women**, but you need to recognise the style and cut of the dress and shop according to your requirement. The same goes for **party wear dresses for womens**. What kind of a party is it? Is it a casual hang with friends or a formal event where you might meet important people, and will then be required to make an impression? Buy party **women dresses online India** appropriate. Thirdly, when shopping for **western dresses for womens**, the neckline is a crucial aspect to keep in mind. How risqué do you want to be? Additionally, the neckline will also depend on the occasion. You might be needed to wear a cocktail dress, but it could still be a formal event. But don’t worry, at Westside, shop hundreds of options for western **womens dresses online** and at the stores. Hundreds of options are available even when you are **online shopping womens dresses**. 

Why **jumpsuits for women** are wardrobe must-haves

**Ladies jumpsuits** are extremely cool outfits that are both convenient and stylish. It is true that **ladies jumpsuits** are not formal wear appropriate, but for that street wear edge, invest in bunch of them, because they will definitely up your cool quotient. markdown:
# Buy Jeans Western Wear for Women Online at Best Prices

**What to keep in mind when buying jeans for womens**

Let’s face it: we live in our jeans. From work to casual hangouts to even at home sometimes, we are wearing jeans. Jeans are hardcore and durable, extremely comfortable and stylish, and most importantly, so low maintenance. They don’t wrinkle or need special care. They work with any outfit, and can easily be a part of work wear or casual wear. And can we just take a minute to appreciate the crazy varieties of styles and cuts **ladies jeans** that are available today? From skinny fits to carrot fits, straight cuts to flared cuts, ankle lengths and high-waisted mommy jeans, you name the kind of [**jeans for women**](https://www.westside.com/collections/jeans-for-women) you are looking for and you will find it. Whether you are shopping **ladies jeans online** or at the Westside stores, the wide range of options will surely amaze you. But before you shop **jeans for womens**, let’s take a look at things to keep in mind to make a great buy. 

Features of **ladies jeans** to look for

Buying **ladies jeans** could be a little tricky if you don’t know what you are looking for. Firstly, it is important to understand your body type and understand what style of denims will look good on you. Do you want a slim fit, a skinny fit, or a super skinny fit? Always remember that skinny fit **ladies jeans** create the illusion of length and make you look taller and slimmer, and you have the option to either wear slim tops or flowy fits, asymmetrical cuts, and oversized tops, because everything works with slimmer bottoms. When shopping **jeans for womens online** always look for a cut that works for you shape and requirement. But if you want easier fits, straighter cuts, and high-waisted options, tons of choices are available for you. Check out high-waisted **ladies jeans online** on Instagram and see how they pair beautifully with any top as a part of any ensemble. Straighter cuts are more appropriate for work, especially for casual Fridays, while skinny fits make more sense as a part of casual and party wear. 

Are you a fan of distressed **jeans for womens**?

After you have selected the cut of choice, remember that you have a bunch of style options too. From faded varieties to acid washed denims, from a worn-out look, to heavily ripped and distressed jeans, the world’s your oyster. If you are in any doubt, check out **jeans for womens online** on Instagram or Pinterest for OOTD inspirations on how you can style your favourite kind of jeans. If you are a fan of distressed denims, and love the rugged biker look, style distressed and ripped jeans with printed tees, tops, and layer up with jackets. While leather jackets look fantastic with ripped jeans, while you are shopping for **ladies jeans online**, also check out denim jackets to create a denim on denim look which is a major trend this year for womenswear. At Westside, whether you are looking for your favourite pair of **jeans for womens online** or at the stores, you will definitely be bowled over by the options available.

Different kinds of tops for womens wardrobes
Ladies tops must be the most-shopped and most-searched product at stores and online. And why shouldn’t it be? As one of the basic essentials, everybody is constantly shopping tops for womens closets every season. Women need tops for work, various kinds of professional engagements, semi-formal events, casual get-togethers, occasions and festivities, and, well, even as a part of home wear. Ladies tops, therefore, form the most important part of any woman’s wardrobe. To match every occasion and activity it is required for, today, tops come in various colours, styles, cuts, silhouettes, and prints. From printed casual ladies tops to subtle and muted work wear, from vibrant, ethnic-style fusion tops for women who need options for Indian festivities, to comfortable loungewear, there is a perfect top for everything requirement. When purchasing women’s tops online shopping provides a wide range of options. And at Westside, whether you want formal options, offbeat styles, or regular casual choices, you will find over hundreds of options at the stores or online. 
What kind of ladies tops are you looking for?
Let’s start with the most common requirement - tops for womens who go to the office every day. You are obviously looking for women’s formal tops. Formal-style womens western tops come in various colours, prints, and styles. You can choose from a variety of solids, which pair beautifully with blazers and jackets, or select women’s formal tops in stripes or checks. When shopping for womens western tops, be it formal or casual, you have both summer and winter options. For the colder weathers, choose knitted varieties. Those who are looking for women’s casual tops, the sky’s the limit. Choose graphic-printed tops, longline styles, and women’s casual tops in a wide variety of silhouettes and constructions that can be worn for any occasion or activity you can think of. When you are shopping ladies tops online, it is always important to first zero in on your requirement. Because shopping womens western tops can be such an overwhelming experience, decide on what you are looking for. Women’s formal tops are differently styled and constructed than women’s casual tops, and not dressing up according to the occasion or event, might be frowned upon.
Do you love shopping for ladies tops online?
When it comes to women’s tops online shopping is everybody’s favourite destination. Aren’t we always adding ladies tops to cart? The best website to buy tops for womens though, is Westside. The collections are extremely impressive and whether you are shopping ladies tops online at Westside or at the stores, you will never be disappointed. When you buy tops for womens, always look for your favourite styles, but it’s a lot of fun to try out new trends too. Tie-dye is big this season, so maybe, next time, check out tie-dye ladies tops online. If you have only been wearing solids to work, buy tops for womens in stripes and checks, or maybe experiment with micro prints or understated prints as a part of your work wear wardrobe. When you are planning to buy casual women’s tops online shopping or at stores, try out styles that you never have before. That’s what’s exciting, right?
